section.name: JDO Identity
section.p: All JDO-enabled persistable classes need to have an "identity". There are three types of identity defineable using JDO. These are datastore identity (where the identity is assigned by JDO using a surrogate field), application identity (where you define a field or fields of your class to define the identity), and nondurable identity (where there is no identity as such, useful for things like log messages etc).
